mapper.sql: id, user_id, stat_date, new_cards, review_cards, correct_cards, study_duration, create_time, update_time
mapper.update: INSERT INTO flashcard_daily_stats (user_id, stat_date, new_cards, review_cards, correct_cards, study_duration, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{statDate}, #{newCards}, #{reviewCards}, #{correctCards}, #{duration}, NOW(), NOW()) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE new_cards = new_cards + #{newCards}, review_cards = review_cards + #{reviewCards}, correct_cards = correct_cards + #{correctCards}, study_duration = study_duration + #{duration}, update_time = NOW()
